meanings.definition: To go beyond what is allowed or expected.
meanings.sent1: She always exceeds the speed limit when driving.
meanings.sent2: The number of guests exceeds the capacity of the small restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The cat exceeds the limit of cuteness when it plays with a ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work exceeds all boundaries, reaching new heights.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the room exceeds all expectations, filling the air with energy.

meanings.definition: To be greater in number or size than something else.
meanings.sent1: The amount of homework exceeds what I can finish in one night.
meanings.sent2: Her collection of stamps exceeds mine by a large margin.
meanings.sent3: The laughter in the room exceeds the volume of the movie playing.
meanings.sent4: His kindness exceeds the depth of the ocean, touching everyone he meets.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset exceeds any painting, creating a breathtaking scene.
